column4: Adobe flash Settings Manager dialog box in Ubuntu 12.04 is not click-able, how can I resolve this kind of issue?
blame Adobe for making substandard software
Seriously. A lot of people has this problem and it seems to relate to gnome-do or unity. I don't have this problem in unity 2D.
sorry for my position on this, but on my box I see more "Sorry, the Flash plugin has crashed" then actual Flash content. That's why I blame Adobe.
